name: Toy Box (Sey Atkinson)
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Select a game

Fireflires: WASD to move and collect friends

Slot Cars: Space to go!

This is a collection of toys/games from my childhood. I will be adding and developing this more over time.

Made for Make-A-Thing Sept 2018

Inspired by the words;          Verdant              Radiate               Tandem

Winter, Windy - TheDweebMan
